hero.title: Easily Share Worship Setlists and Scores
hero.description:
No more hassle searching through hymnals
to prepare worship setlists.
Easily search for songs
and quickly share setlists and scores.

howToUse.title:
How to Share
Worship Setlists and Scores

step0.subTitle:
Struggling with preparing setlists,
scores, and sharing with team members?
step0.description: With Charistian, you can do it all in one go

step1.subTitle: ① Go to the Score List Page
step1.description:
Upload the scores used by your church
and view them here.

step2.subTitle: ② Search for Desired Songs
step2.description:
Upload the scores used by your church
and search/view them here.

step3.subTitle:
③ Add Desired Songs to the Setlist
and Click 'Create Setlist'
step3.description:
Press the play button
to listen to the song's reference audio
(reference audio upload required).

step4.subTitle: ④ Enter Details for Setlist Creation
step4.description:
Share instructions with team members
using the setlist title, date, and detailed description.

step5.subTitle: ⑤ Review the Setlist
step5.description:
Change the order with drag-and-drop
and share selected reference audio.

step6.subTitle:
⑥ Select Sharing Recipients
and Click 'Share Setlist & Scores'!
step6.description:
Set the sharing recipients,
and the setlist and scores will be shared via email
with all members of the selected team!

step7.subTitle:
⑦ Check the Setlist and
Integrated Scores via Email
step7.description:
Click the 'Download PDF' button
to view the setlist scores
as a single PDF file.

items.question: What is this service?
items.answer: Our service helps worship teams upload scores, create setlists, share them with team members, and manage schedules and attendance.

items.question: How do I sign up?
items.answer: Churches can register to manage teams, and members can sign up to access shared resources.

items.question: Is it mobile-friendly?
items.answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and works seamlessly on mobile devices.

items.question: Does it support multiple languages?
items.answer: Yes, we support Korean and Japanese, with more languages coming soon.

attendance.title: Attendance Management
attendance.description:
Check attendance with QR codes on smartphones
and gain real-time insights
to pray more for your members.

schedule.title: Church Schedule Sharing
schedule.description:
Share church schedules with members.
Announce retreats or meeting dates in advance
to boost participation.

steps.title: Church Registration
steps.description: Register the church to use the service.

steps.title: Church Registration Approval
steps.description: The Charistian team verifies for duplicates and suitability before approval.

steps.title:
Set Groups/Departments
/Teams/Positions
steps.description: Log in with the email used for church registration and customize groups, departments, teams, and positions to fit your church's needs.

steps.title: Member Signup
steps.description: Guide your church members to sign up for Charistian.

steps.title: Role Assignment
steps.description: Assign admin roles to some members to manage attendance checks.

cta.title:
Join thousands of churches using
Charistian!
cta.description:
Is sharing worship setlists and scores this easy?
Get started now!

footer.description: Worship setlist and score sharing platform

SpecifiedCommercialTransaction.title: Specified Commercial Transaction Act
SpecifiedCommercialTransaction.additionalFeesContent: No additional fees are incurred for using the service. Internet connection costs are the responsibility of the customer.
SpecifiedCommercialTransaction.refundPolicyContent:
＜Returns and Cancellations Due to Customer Reasons＞
Due to the nature of the service, returns, refunds, and cancellations are not possible. Upon subscription cancellation, the service ends immediately regardless of the remaining period.

＜In Case of Service Defects＞
If there is a defect in the service (e.g., system errors causing functionality issues), please contact us at charistian.co@gmail.com. We will review the situation and provide alternative services or process a refund if necessary.
SpecifiedCommercialTransaction.deliveryTimeContent: Service is available immediately after payment completion.
SpecifiedCommercialTransaction.paymentTimingContent: Immediate payment (processed upon subscription, with automatic renewal thereafter)

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.description: Integrity's Terms of Service. Defines the conditions for use by churches (organizations) and members.

article1.title: Article 1 (General Provisions)
article1.item1: These Terms of Service (hereinafter 'Terms') govern the conditions and procedures for using the service (hereinafter 'Service') provided by Integrity (hereinafter 'Company').
article1.item2: Users of the Service are divided into churches (organizations) and members. Churches (organizations) are the contracting and payment entities, while members use the Service under the church's management.
article1.item3: By using the Service, users are deemed to have agreed to these Terms.
article1.item4: The Company may revise these Terms as necessary, and changes will be announced on the Service's website.

article2.title: Article 2 (User Categories and Permissions)
article2.item1: Churches (organizations) contract for free or paid plans and have the authority to manage members.
article2.item2: Members can use the Service within the scope of the plan contracted by the church (organization). Members do not make direct payments.
article2.item3: Services available to members include viewing and creating setlists, viewing and creating scores, and other related features within the scope allowed by the church (organization).
article2.item4: Using the Service requires an internet connection and a compatible device.

article3.title: Article 3 (Service Plans)
article3.item1: The Company offers the following plans:
article3.freePlan: FREE Plan: Up to 10 member registrations, 2 weekly/8 monthly setlist creations, up to 50 score registrations
article3.smartPlan: SMART Plan: 9,900 KRW/month, up to 150 member registrations, 10 weekly/100 monthly setlist creations, up to 800 score registrations
article3.enterprisePlan: ENTERPRISE Plan: 49,000 KRW/month, unlimited member registrations, unlimited setlist creations, unlimited score uploads
article3.item2: Churches (organizations) manage member usage within the limits of the selected plan.

article4.title: Article 4 (Payment and Subscription)
article4.item1: Paid plans for the Service must be paid immediately by the church (organization) via credit card (using Stripe).
article4.item2: Subscriptions are automatically renewed until the church (organization) completes the cancellation process.
article4.item3: Upon payment completion, the church (organization) and its managed members can immediately use the services of the selected plan.

article5.title: Article 5 (Refund Policy)
article5.item1: Due to the nature of the Service, refunds, returns, and cancellations are not possible.
article5.item2: Churches (organizations) should carefully select their subscription plan.
article5.item3: Upon subscription cancellation, the Service ends immediately regardless of the remaining period, and member usage is also terminated.

article6.title: Article 6 (Contact)
article6.item1: Inquiries can be made via email ({email}).

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description: Integrity's Privacy Policy. Governs the collection, use, and protection of user personal information.

article1.title: Article 1 (Collected Information)
article1.item1: The Company may collect the following personal information when users use the Service:

subItems.item1: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact information.
subItems.item2: Church (organization) name, location, position, and other organization-related information.
subItems.item3: Service usage records, IP address, cookie information, and other usage data.
subItems.item4: Other information voluntarily provided by the user.

article2.title: Article 2 (Purpose of Using Personal Information)
article2.item1: Collected personal information is used for the following purposes:

subItems.item1: Provision and operation of the Service.
subItems.item3: Analysis and statistics for service improvement.
subItems.item4: Compliance with laws and response to legal requests.

article3.title: Article 3 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
article3.item1: The Company does not provide personal information to third parties without user consent, except as permitted by law.
article3.item2: If provided to third parties, the purpose and scope of provision will be clearly notified.

article4.title: Article 4 (Protection of Personal Information)
article4.item1: The Company appropriately manages personal information and takes reasonable measures to prevent unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or leakage.
article4.item2: Personal information is retained only for the period necessary to achieve the purpose and is appropriately deleted thereafter.

article5.title: Article 5 (User Rights)
article5.item1: Users may request access, correction, deletion, or suspension of use of their personal information from the Company.
article5.item2: Requests are processed through the contact point specified in Article 6.

article6.title: Article 6 (Contact)
article6.item1: Inquiries regarding personal information can be made via the following email address: {email}
article6.item2: The Company responds promptly to inquiries.

EventModal.title: Score Upload Agency Event
EventModal.description:
Is uploading scores a hassle?
Send us your score files now, and Charistian will upload them for you!
Up to 20 files are allowed, only in PDF or JPG format.
Delays may occur if there are many requests.
